price: 36. But We found not there any household of the Muslims except one [of Lût (Lot) and his two daughters].
arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: famā wajadnā fīhā ghayra baytin mina al-mus'limīna
